column4: how do i change my icon theme? i have the folder in /usr/share/icons/
system->prefs->appearance, hit the customize button. Then you can select icon theme
if you think you have better google-fu try finding a page for why if [ "ping -c 1 -I eth0 www.google.com | sed -e 's/.*/ping/'" = "ping" ] ; then errors saying im giving it no imput (unary)
if I was a sed fan I might be able to
